H0.text: Antananarivo is the capital of which country. Mozambique

H1.text: Antananarivo is the capital of which country. Comoros

H2.text: Antananarivo is the capital of which country. Seychelles

H3.text: Antananarivo is the capital of which country. Madgascar

A4.text: Antananarivo is the capital and largest city of Madagascar.

A5.text: King Andrianjaka founded Antananarivo as the capital of his Imerina Kingdom around 1610 or 1625 upon the site of a captured Vazimba capital on the hilltop of Analamanga.

A6.text: Antananarivo became the center of administration for virtually the entire island.
